comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: If was taken on 1913 it must be February during the ten tragic days (La Decena Trágica), about 9th. On The Day Book, issue February 17, 1913 (The Library of Congress) there's a similar version of this photo. Above is read "PHOTO OF THE SEVEN-DAY BATTLE IN MEXICO"; on the footnote: "Scores of dead and wounded lying before the National Palace just after the great battle in the Zocalo Plaza. Armed guards are seen parading the roof of the palace." This photo is close linked to www.flickr.com/photos/smu_cul_digitalcollections/3790109812/ of this collection Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon
